location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication from the Resident, dated 3 January 1815. In response, it informs the Resident that a monetary reward has been granted to Stephen Watson Henshaw for his service in recovering company property from the Ahmed Shah.
